channel.title: Very stuck, need assistance! Rep given!
channel.description:
[b]The one that helps me compile with no errors will get Repp++ when I can, and I'll give you credits when I release the source. I'm coding X5's server source. And adding Barrows, posted by "Rune Hunter" on Rune-Servers forums. I've added everything successfully with the help of a friend. But neither me or him could figure out how to fix an error, I fixed that error =D. But now I have 2 new errors, and if anyone could help that would be very great![/b]
[b]First error:[/b] [code].\Java\client.java:57: ';' expected public void Veraccoffin() ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code] [b]Fixed that by removing a code from the bottem of the statement, and adding it to the top. Error number 2:[/b] [code].\Java\client.java:74: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcID location: class client server.npcHandler.newNPC(npcID, (absX), (absY), heightLevel, abs X + 3, absY + 3, absX - 3, absY - 3, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), f alse); ^ .\Java\client.java:74: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcID location: class client server.npcHandler.newNPC(npcID, (absX), (absY), heightLevel, abs X + 3, absY + 3, absX - 3, absY - 3, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), f alse);
^ Note: .\Java\stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
[b]Once again, Rep++ Will be given when possible, and you will be given credits when source is released. Please, and thanks in advance![/b]

item.description:
@agent_nukks wrote:

Dude, I said I fixed that? And READ it Repp++ when I can!?
But I need assistance on the two other errors, if you full yread the post.

item.description:
@xBl1tzScapex wrote:

Lol you can’t even rep, but i’ll help

it says you need a ;
So it should look like this
public void Veraccoffin();
instead of
public void Veraccoffin()

Read full topic

item.title: Very stuck, need assistance! Rep given!
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Well, in the void newNPC, you perhaps did…

public void NewNPC(int absX, int absY, int height, npcID) {

Just follow that rule, if you would like it to move +3 up or -3 down…
In that void, absX + 3 or absY - 3 etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Very stuck, need assistance! Rep given!
item.dc:creator: @agent_nukks agent nukks
item.description:
@agent_nukks wrote:

The one that helps me compile with no errors will get Repp++ when I can, and I’ll give you credits when I release the source. I’m coding X5’s server source. And adding Barrows, posted by “Rune Hunter” on Rune-Servers forums. I’ve added everything successfully with the help of a friend. But neither me or him could figure out how to fix an error, I fixed that error =D. But now I have 2 new errors, and if anyone could help that would be very great!

First error:

.\Java\client.java:57: ';' expected public void Veraccoffin() ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
Fixed that by removing a code from the bottem of the statement, and adding it to the top.
Error number 2:

[code].\Java\client.java:74: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable npcID
location: class client
server.npcHandler.newNPC(npcID, (absX), (absY), heightLevel, abs
X + 3, absY + 3, absX - 3, absY - 3, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), f
alse);
^
.\Java\client.java:74: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable npcID
location: class client
server.npcHandler.newNPC(npcID, (absX), (absY), heightLevel, abs
X + 3, absY + 3, absX - 3, absY - 3, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), f
alse);

                                                                   ^

Note: .\Java\stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Once again, Rep++ Will be given when possible, and you will be given credits when source is released.
Please, and thanks in advance!
